Detailed Description

This namespace gathers several functions related to an RL simulation.

Function Documentation

dds::simulation::SimulationRecord dds::simulation::simulate ( dds::Agent *  agent,
dds::MDP *  mdp,
double  gamma,
unsigned int  T,
bool  safeSim = true 
)
throw (AgentException,
MDPException
)

Perform a single trajectory simulation.

Parameters
agentThe agent interacting with the MDP.
mdpThe MDP representing the environment.
gammaThe discount factor.
TThe horizon limit.
safeSimIf true, the MDP is 'unknown', preventing the agent to access MDP data (e.g.: the transition matrix).
Returns
A SimulationRecord storing all the data about the simulation performed.
